title: Monster Mash
description:
First printed in the 
Chicks Kick Butt
 anthology. The Wolf Man, The Hunchback of Notre Dame, The Mummy, Dracula--all portrayed by silent film star Lon Chaney and his son, Lon Chaney Jr. The real monster, though, hid at the heart of the Chaney family.In a supernatural-run Las Vegas, the werewolf mob boss employs Delilah Street, human paranormal investigator, to rid a haunted hotel-casino of an infestation of old movie monsters.Cover and interior photo illustrations by the author
author: Carole Nelson Douglas
